name: Together FOREVER! || GMTK 2021
description:
Sadly, the main mechanic,  which is pulling eatch other through their connected bowels, is not working properly in this WebGL build. It was perfect inside the Unity Editor, I don't know why it is bad like this in the final build. I had no time to test the build and couldn't correct it. I am very sorry.

BOWEL BUGS SOMETIMES, PRESS R TO RESET (SORRY, IT WORKED FINE IN UNITY EDITOR BUT IS BUGGY IN WEBGL BUILD)

Actually, it bugs a lot. I tried a mechanic to reset it, but there was not enough time after I realized the final build runs buggy in webGL. I am sorry :(

PLAY IN FULL SCREEN SO ALT KEY WON'T STOP THE GAME (SORRY)

I actually forgot ALT key in a browser game is a bad idea. Play in fullscreen to circumvent this problem.

HAVE FUN! (AT LEAST SOME, HOPEFULLY)
